languages.text: "Прошу прощения, Ваша Светлость, но вы сами пожелали высадиться на Футфол инкогнито. Этим вы лишили меня возможности обеспечить вам многочисленную охрану, соответствующую вашему высокому статусу. Потому я настоятельно советую вам проявлять осторожность на станции до тех пор, пока вы не решите публично объявить о том, что станция удостоилась чести принимать Вольного Торговца".

"I beg your pardon, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, but it was your wish to arrive on Footfall incognito. By doing so, you have deprived me of the opportunity to provide you with numerous guards befitting your high status. Therefore, I strongly advise you to exercise caution on the station until you decide to publicly announce that Footfall has the honour of hosting a Rogue Trader."
languages.original_text: "Прошу прощения, Ваша Светлость, но вы сами пожелали высадиться на Футфол инкогнито. Этим вы лишили меня возможности обеспечить вам многочисленную охрану, соответствующую вашему высокому статусу. Потому я настоятельно советую вам проявлять осторожность на станции до тех пор, пока вы не решите публично объявить о том, что станция удостоилась чести принимать Вольного Торговца".

traits.locale_text: "I beg your pardon, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, but it was your wish to arrive on Footfall incognito. By doing so, you have deprived me of the opportunity to provide you with numerous enforcers befitting your high status. Therefore, I strongly advise you to exercise caution on the station until you decide to publicly announce that Footfall has the honour of hosting a Rogue Trader."

"I beg your pardon, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, but it was your wish to arrive on Footfall incognito. By doing so, you have deprived me of the opportunity to provide you with numerous enforcers befitting your high status. Therefore, I strongly advise you to exercise caution on the station until you decide to publicly announce that Footfall has the honour of hosting a Rogue Trader."

"I beg your pardon, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, but it was your wish to arrive on Footfall incognito. By doing so, you have deprived me of the opportunity to provide you with numerous guards befitting your high status. Therefore, I strongly advise you to exercise caution on the station until you decide to publicly announce that Footfall has the honour of hosting a Rogue Trader."

languages.text: 「これは失礼した、陛下。しかし、お忍びでフットフォールに到着するのは君の希望だ。そのせいで、私はその高い地位にふさわしい多数の護衛を遣わせるチャンスを奪われたのだ。故に、フットフォールが自由開拓者を迎える名誉を受けた件の公表が決定するまでは、ステーションでは用心することを強くお勧めする」
languages.original_text: "I beg your pardon, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, but it was your wish to arrive on Footfall incognito. By doing so, you have deprived me of the opportunity to provide you with numerous guards befitting your high status. Therefore, I strongly advise you to exercise caution on the station until you decide to publicly announce that Footfall has the honour of hosting a Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: 「これは失礼した、陛下。しかし、お忍びでフットフォールに到着するのは君の希望だ。そのせいで、私はその高い地位にふさわしい多数の護衛を遣わせるチャンスを奪われたのだ。故に、フットフォールが自由開拓者を迎える名誉を受けた件の公表が決定するまでは、ステーションでは用心することを強くお勧めする」

languages.text: “请原谅，大人，但是您自己打算隐姓埋名抵达落脚港。您的选择让我没有机会为您提供地位相称的护卫。因此，我强烈建议您在落脚港保持谨慎，直到您决定公开宣布，落脚港有幸接待了一位行商浪人。”
languages.original_text: "I beg your pardon, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, but it was your wish to arrive on Footfall incognito. By doing so, you have deprived me of the opportunity to provide you with numerous guards befitting your high status. Therefore, I strongly advise you to exercise caution on the station until you decide to publicly announce that Footfall has the honour of hosting a Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: “请原谅，大人，但是您自己打算隐姓埋名抵达落脚港。您的选择让我没有机会为您提供地位相称的护卫。因此，我强烈建议您在落脚港保持谨慎，直到您决定公开宣布，落脚港有幸接待了一位行商浪人。”

languages.text: «Le ruego que me disculpe, {mf|milord|milady}, pero usted precisó llegar a Paso de incógnito. A razón de ello, no he tenido la oportunidad de brindarle el número de guardias que merece su alto estatus. Por lo tanto, le aconsejo encarecidamente que actúe con cautela en la estación hasta que decida anunciar públicamente que Paso tiene el honor de recibir a {mf|un|una} Comerciante Independiente».
languages.original_text: "I beg your pardon, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, but it was your wish to arrive on Footfall incognito. By doing so, you have deprived me of the opportunity to provide you with numerous guards befitting your high status. Therefore, I strongly advise you to exercise caution on the station until you decide to publicly announce that Footfall has the honour of hosting a Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: «Le ruego que me disculpe, {mf|milord|milady}, pero usted precisó llegar a Paso de incógnito. A razón de ello, no he tenido la oportunidad de brindarle el número de guardias que merece su alto estatus. Por lo tanto, le aconsejo encarecidamente que actúe con cautela en la estación hasta que decida anunciar públicamente que Paso tiene el honor de recibir a {mf|un|una} Comerciante Independiente».

languages.text: « Toutes mes excuses, Votre Seigneurie, mais c'est vous qui avez tenu à arriver à Castel incognito. En prenant cette décision, vous m'avez empêché de vous fournir une escorte armée comme l'exige votre statut. Je vous suggère donc vivement de faire preuve de prudence dans la station tant que vous n'aurez pas décidé d'annoncer publiquement que Castel a l'honneur d'accueillir {mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande}. »
languages.original_text: "I beg your pardon, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, but it was your wish to arrive on Footfall incognito. By doing so, you have deprived me of the opportunity to provide you with numerous guards befitting your high status. Therefore, I strongly advise you to exercise caution on the station until you decide to publicly announce that Footfall has the honour of hosting a Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: « Toutes mes excuses, Votre Seigneurie, mais c'est vous qui avez tenu à arriver à Castel incognito. En prenant cette décision, vous m'avez empêché de vous fournir une escorte armée comme l'exige votre statut. Je vous suggère donc vivement de faire preuve de prudence dans la station tant que vous n'aurez pas décidé d'annoncer publiquement que Castel a l'honneur d'accueillir {mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande}. »

languages.text: "Ich bitte um Verzeihung, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, aber es war Euer Wunsch, Footfall inkognito zu betreten. Dadurch habt Ihr mir die Möglichkeit genommen, Euch zahlreiche Wachen zuzuweisen, wie es Eurem Status entspräche. Ich rate Euch deshalb dringend dazu, auf der Station Vorsicht walten zu lassen, bis Ihr beschließt, öffentlich zu verkünden, dass Footfall die Ehre hat, {mf|einen Freihändler|eine Freihändlerin} zu beherbergen."
languages.original_text: "I beg your pardon, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, but it was your wish to arrive on Footfall incognito. By doing so, you have deprived me of the opportunity to provide you with numerous guards befitting your high status. Therefore, I strongly advise you to exercise caution on the station until you decide to publicly announce that Footfall has the honour of hosting a Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bitte um Verzeihung, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, aber es war Euer Wunsch, Footfall inkognito zu betreten. Dadurch habt Ihr mir die Möglichkeit genommen, Euch zahlreiche Wachen zuzuweisen, wie es Eurem Status entspräche. Ich rate Euch deshalb dringend dazu, auf der Station Vorsicht walten zu lassen, bis Ihr beschließt, öffentlich zu verkünden, dass Footfall die Ehre hat, {mf|einen Freihändler|eine Freihändlerin} zu beherbergen."

languages.text: "Affedin {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri lakin Binliman'a kılık değiştirerek gelmeyi siz istediniz. Bu vesileyle beni de yüce makamınıza yaraşır çoğunlukta muhafız sağlama fırsatından mahrum bırakmış oldunuz. Binliman'ın bir Hür Tacir'e ev sahipliği yapma şerefine nail olduğunu kamuoyuna duyuruncaya dek istasyonda dolaşırken dikkatli olmanızı şiddetle tavsiye ederim."
languages.original_text: "I beg your pardon, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, but it was your wish to arrive on Footfall incognito. By doing so, you have deprived me of the opportunity to provide you with numerous guards befitting your high status. Therefore, I strongly advise you to exercise caution on the station until you decide to publicly announce that Footfall has the honour of hosting a Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: "Affedin {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri lakin Binliman'a kılık değiştirerek gelmeyi siz istediniz. Bu vesileyle beni de yüce mevkinize uygun müteaddit muhafız sağlama fırsatından mahrum bıraktınız. Bu sebeple Binliman'ın bir Hür Tacir'e ev sahipliği yapma şerefine sahip olduğunu kamuoyuna duyurmaya karar verene kadar istasyonda dolaşırken dikkatli olmanızı şiddetle tavsiye ederim."
